name: An Entire Legion Of My Best Troops
Lore: 'Stormtrooper standard gear includes plastoid composite armor, utility belt, positive-grip boots and energy sinks to dissipate blaster fire.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. Stormtroopers (except biker scouts) have armor = 4. Also, your blaster rifles, Stormtrooper Utility Belts and Blaster Scopes are deploy -1 and are destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. (Immune to Alter.)',
